item.title: 内容饥渴的印度顶级流媒体平台
item.description: 周二晚些时候，苹果公司与印度电信运营商 Bharti Airtel 签订了一份内容协议，力图在印度 280 亿美元的娱乐市场上分一杯羹。【原文：Apple signed a content deal with Indian telecoms operator Bharti Airtel late on Tuesday in its push for a larger slice of the country's $28 billion entertainment market.】

item.title: 中国餐饮外卖巨头美团营收超出预期
item.description: 中国餐饮外卖巨头美团周三公布，第二季度营收增长21%，超过预期，一反中国经济放缓的颓势。【原文：Chinese food delivery giant Meituan posted a bigger than expected 21% rise in second-quarter revenue on Wednesday, defying a slowing Chinese economy.】

item.title: 押注中国需求，香港开发商转向租赁市场
item.description: 一些香港开发商目前正转向房屋租赁和租赁市场，以抵御房地产市场的长期低迷，并满足中国大陆专业人士和学生激增的租赁需求。【原文：Some Hong Kong developers are now turning to housing rental and the leasing market to weather a prolonged downturn in its property market and to serve surging rental demand from mainland Chinese professionals and students.】

item.title: 中国迪迪公司将成为国家支持的纳维信息公司的第二大股东
item.description: 中国打车服务巨头迪迪环球公司（DiDi Global）周三在提交给证券交易所的一份文件中表示，将用现金及其智能驾驶和驾驶舱部门换取国家支持的地图公司纳维信息（NavInfo）旗下子公司高德（AutoAi）16.5%的股份。【原文：Chinese ride-hailing giant DiDi Global will swap cash plus its smart driving and cockpit unit for 16.5% of AutoAi, a subsidiary of state-backed maps firm NavInfo , the latter said in a stock exchange filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 马来西亚航空公司的航空运营证书因技术问题被削减至 1 年
item.description: 马来西亚交通部长周三表示，在对马来西亚航空公司面临的技术问题进行调查后，马来西亚民航监管机构已将马来西亚航空公司的航空运营商证书有效期从三年缩短为一年。【原文：Malaysia's civil aviation regulator has cut the duration of Malaysia Airlines' air operator certificate from three years to one, following a probe into technical issues faced by the state carrier, the transport minister said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 德国《商报》：大众乘用车品牌努力实现削减成本目标
item.description: 据德国商业报纸《Handelsblatt》周三报道，大众汽车乘用车品牌正努力实现其 100 亿欧元（约合 111.4 亿美元）的成本削减目标，低迷的销量和零部件缺失等问题削弱了这一目标。【原文：Volkswagen's passenger cars brand is struggling to meet its 10 billion euro ($11.14 billion) cost-cutting target, undermined by issues including low sales and missing parts, German business paper Handelsblatt reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 又有两家中国航空公司将开始飞行中国制造的中国商飞 C919 喷射器
item.description: 国营的中国中央电视台称，中国国际航空公司和中国南方航空公司的首架客机将于本周三交付，届时这两家航空公司将成为中国第二家和第三家执飞中国自主研制的中国商飞 C919 客机的航空公司。【原文：Air China and China Southern Airlines will become the second and third Chinese carriers to fly China's homegrown COMAC C919 passenger jet when their first planes are delivered on Wednesday, state-run Chinese Central TV said.】

item.title: 乐高在欧洲和北美销售强劲，表现优于玩具市场
item.description: 总部位于丹麦的玩具制造商乐高公司周三表示，在欧洲和北美强劲需求的推动下，今年上半年乐高彩色塑料砖的销量超过了整个玩具市场。【原文：Lego's sales of its colorful plastic bricks outpaced the overall toy market in the first half of the year, driven by strong demand in Europe and North America, the Denmark-based toymaker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 现代汽车将混合动力产品阵容扩大一倍，目标到 2030 年销量增长 30
item.description: 现代汽车（Hyundai Motor）周三表示，其目标是到2030年全球年销量达到555万辆，比2023年增长30%，同时计划将混合动力车阵容扩大一倍，以应对全球电动汽车需求的放缓。【原文：Hyundai Motor said on Wednesday it was targeting annual global sales of 5.55 million vehicles by 2030, up 30% from 2023, as it plans to double its hybrid lineup to counter a slowdown in global electric vehicle demand.】

item.title: 韩国将要求 Telegram 和其他社交媒体公司协助打击数字性犯罪
item.description: 韩国当局周三表示，他们计划要求 Telegram 和其他社交媒体平台更积极地帮助删除和屏蔽色情深层伪造内容，这是为解决日益严重的问题而采取的部分措施。【原文：South Korean authorities said on Wednesday they plan to ask Telegram and other social media platforms to more actively help with the deletion and blocking of sexually explicit deepfake content, part of measures aimed at tackling the growing problem.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场在英伟达数据公布前受到惊吓
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 北欧航空公司 SAS 完成重组，退出美国破产程序
item.description: 斯堪的纳维亚航空公司 SAS 周三表示，该公司已完成重组，摆脱了美国破产保护程序。【原文：Scandinavian airline SAS has completed restructuring and emerged from Chapter 11 bankruptcy proceedings in the United States, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美元走强导致黄金下跌，市场等待美国通胀数据
item.description: 周三，金价因美元走高而下滑，而投资者则在等待本周将公布的一份关键的美国通胀报告，以进一步明确 9 月份可能降息的幅度。【原文：Gold prices slipped on Wednesday as the dollar ticked up, while investors awaited a key U.S. inflation report due this week for more clarity on the size of a likely September rate cut.】

item.title: 日本央行行长绯野重申：如果经济步入正轨，将随时准备加息
item.description: 日本央行副行长绯野良造周三重申了央行的立场，即如果通胀保持不变，央行将继续提高利率，同时还将密切关注金融市场状况。【原文：Bank of Japan Deputy Governor Ryozo Himino on Wednesday reiterated the central bank's stance that it would continue to raise interest rates if inflation stayed on course, while also closely monitoring financial market conditions.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，全球数千名用户的社交媒体平台 X 出现故障
item.description: 据停电跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，社交媒体平台 X 在周二晚些时候出现停电，高峰时美国有超过 3.65 万份报告。【原文：Social media platform X experienced outages late on Tuesday, with over 36,500 reports in the U.S. at the peak of the outage, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果公司服务部门裁员约 100 人
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，苹果公司已在其服务部门裁员约 100 人，其中负责苹果图书应用程序和苹果书店的团队裁员幅度最大。【原文：Apple Inc has cut about 100 jobs in its services division, with the biggest cuts in the team responsible for the Apple Books app and Apple Bookstore, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英伟达财报在即，股市止步于历史最高点
item.description: 周三，全球股市接近历史高点，下一步走势取决于芯片制造市场宠儿英伟达（Nvidia）的业绩，而英镑则创下了两年半以来的新高，因为交易商押注英国将在降息方面落后于美国。【原文：Global stocks were poised near record highs on Wednesday, with the next move riding on results at chipmaking market darling Nvidia, while sterling notched a 2-1/2 year high as traders bet that Britain will lag the U.S. in cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 地缘政治和需求担忧引发投资者恐慌，石油反弹
item.description: 由于投资者对利比亚和中东地区可能出现的供应损失感到担忧，同时又对全球燃料需求感到忧虑，石油在上一交易日大幅下跌后于周三反弹，结束了连续三天的涨势。【原文：Oil rebounded on Wednesday after a sharp drop in the previous session ended a three-day streak of gains as investors have whipsawed between concerns about potential supply losses from Libya and the Middle East and worries about global fuel demand.】

item.title: 澳大利亚伍尔沃斯公司在派发特别股息后股价上涨，利润符合预期
item.description: 周三，伍尔沃斯（Woolworths）股价攀升，此前这家澳大利亚杂货商宣布派发特别股息，并表示由于削减货架价格以与竞争对手科尔斯（Coles）竞争，其全年利润降幅与分析师预测一致。【原文：Shares of Woolworths climbed on Wednesday after the Australian grocer declared a special dividend and also said its full-year profit dropped in line with analysts' forecast as it slashed shelf prices to compete with rival Coles.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 7 月消费价格通胀率降至 4 个月低点
item.description: 由于政府的电费退税带来了暂时性的拖累，澳大利亚 7 月份的消费者物价上涨速度为四个月来最慢，而核心通胀率则降至六个月来的最低点，这表明成本正在逐步降温。【原文：Australian consumer prices rose at the slowest pace in four months in July as government rebates on electricity provided a temporary drag, while core inflation dipped to its lowest in six months in a sign costs were gradually cooling.】

item.title: 市场等待更多的美国利率线索，货币保持紧张区间波动
item.description: 周三，美元兑一篮子同业货币保持在一年多以来的最低点附近，英镑的交易价格略低于多年来的高点，因为市场聚焦于普遍预期的美国下月降息规模的线索。【原文：The U.S. dollar held near its lowest in more than a year against a basket of peers on Wednesday, with sterling trading just off multi-year highs, as markets focussed on clues to the size of a widely expected U.S. interest rate cut next month.】

item.title: 巴西财政部长表示，他建议在 9 月前选出中央银行新行长
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周二表示，他建议巴西总统在 8 月至 9 月间公布下一任央行行长的提名。【原文：Brazil's Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Tuesday that he suggested to the country's president that the nomination of the next central bank head should be revealed between August and September.】

item.title: HMD 与美泰合作推出芭比娃娃手机
item.description: 生产诺基亚品牌手机的 HMD Global 公司表示，它已与玩具制造商美泰公司合作推出 HMD 芭比手机--一款复古设计的小巧粉色功能翻盖手机。【原文：HMD Global, which makes Nokia -branded phones, said it has teamed up with toymaker Mattel to launch the HMD Barbie Phone - a pint-sized pink feature flip phone with a retro design.】

item.title: 三星 SDI 与通用汽车达成协议，将在美国建造价值 35 亿美元的电动汽车电池联合工厂
item.description: 韩国三星 SDI 公司周三表示，它已与通用汽车公司达成协议，将在美国印第安纳州联合建设一家电动汽车（EV）电池工厂。【原文：South Korea's Samsung SDI said on Wednesday it has completed an agreement with General Motors to build a joint electric vehicle (EV) battery factory in the U.S. state of Indiana.】

item.title: 比特币下跌 6.4% 至 58,777 美元
item.description: 格林尼治标准时间周二22时18分，比特币下跌6.4%，至58777美元。【原文：Bitcoin fell 6.4% to $58,777 at 2218 GMT on Tuesday.】

item.title: 淡水河谷矿业公司董事长称董事会优先选择首席执行官以避免市场噪音
item.description: 巴西矿业公司淡水河谷董事会主席丹尼尔-斯蒂勒（Daniel Stieler）周二告诉路透社，董事会已将确定公司新任首席执行官的工作列为优先事项，以避免市场上出现更多有关潜在候选人的声音。【原文：The board of directors of Brazil miner Vale has prioritized the works of defining a new chief executive for the company to avoid further noises in the market regarding potential candidates, its Chairman Daniel Stieler told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国宏观经济、英伟达阴影挥之不去，亚洲看局部
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 沃尔玛推出新的市场卖家服务，为假日促销助力
item.description: 沃尔玛周二表示，它将为市场卖家提供服务，将他们的商品从亚洲直接运到美国仓库，并履行订单和管理来自任何电子商务网站的退货，这是它在假日季到来之前加强市场业务的一种新方法。【原文：Walmart said on Tuesday it would provide marketplace sellers its services to handle transportation of their goods from Asia directly to its U.S. warehouses, as well as fulfill orders and manage returns from any e-commerce website, in a new approach to bolstering its marketplace business ahead of the holiday season.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，TikTok 内容战略主管将离职
item.description: 据 The Information 周二援引一份发给员工的说明报道，TikTok 的内容战略和政策主管妮可-伊科佩蒂（Nicole Iacopetti）将于 9 月 6 日离职。【原文：TikTok's head of content strategy and policy, Nicole Iacopetti, will leave the company on Sept. 6, The Information reported on Tuesday, citing a note sent to staff.】

item.title: 诺德斯特龙（Nordstrom）第二季度收入因销售活动的推动而增长，股价大涨
item.description: 诺德斯特龙（Nordstrom）周二公布的第二季度销售增长好于预期，这主要得益于其关键的周年促销活动，尽管消费者在通胀压力下仍持谨慎态度，但该公司股价在盘后交易中上涨了 11%。【原文：Nordstrom reported a better-than-expected growth in second-quarter sales on Tuesday, buoyed by its crucial Anniversary Sale event, even as consumers remain cautious amid inflationary pressures, sending its shares up 11% in extended trading.】
